00032 #ifndef Fl_Abstract_Printer_H
00033 #define Fl_Abstract_Printer_H
00034 
00035 #include <FL/Fl_Device.H>
00036 
00042 class Fl_Abstract_Printer : public Fl_Device {
00043   friend class Fl_Pixmap;
00044   friend class Fl_RGB_Image;
00045   friend class Fl_Bitmap;
00046 private:
00047 #ifdef __APPLE__
00048   struct chain_elt {
00049     Fl_Image *image;
00050     const uchar *data;
00051     struct chain_elt *next;
00052   };
00053   void add_image(Fl_Image *image, const uchar *data); // adds an image to the page image list
00054 #endif
00055   void traverse(Fl_Widget *widget); // finds subwindows of widget and prints them
00056 protected:
00058   int x_offset;
00060   int y_offset;
00062   struct chain_elt *image_list_; 
00064   void *gc; 
00066   Fl_Abstract_Printer(void) { gc = NULL; bg_r_ = bg_g_ = bg_b_ = 0; };
00067 #ifdef __APPLE__
00068 
00069   void delete_image_list(); 
00070 #endif
00071 public:
00072   Fl_Device *set_current(void);
00073   virtual int start_job(int pagecount, int *frompage = NULL, int *topage = NULL);
00074   virtual int start_page(void);
00075   virtual int printable_rect(int *w, int *h);
00076   virtual void margins(int *left, int *top, int *right, int *bottom);
00077   virtual void origin(int x, int y);
00078   void origin(int *x, int *y);
00079   virtual void scale(float scale_x, float scale_y);
00080   virtual void rotate(float angle);
00081   virtual void translate(int x, int y);
00082   virtual void untranslate(void);
00083   void print_widget(Fl_Widget* widget, int delta_x = 0, int delta_y = 0);
00084   void print_window_part(Fl_Window *win, int x, int y, int w, int h, int delta_x = 0, int delta_y = 0);
00085   virtual int end_page (void);
00086   virtual void end_job (void);
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif // Fl_Abstract_Printer_H
